review: Trying to get this set up through Sling TV was a headache!!! After nearly an hour of back and forth with Amazon and Sling TV, I thought I was good to go. Then the Sling TV rep pulled a fast one and I wasn't going to be given the 14 day free period as it clearly states on the app. When I questioned him, the answer was that was just the way it was. So I stopped that order and will be returning the box to Amazon without ever finding out if it works. Actually I think that is false advertising and is known as bait and switch which I also believe is illegal.

author: Gabriel

review: This thing worked well out of the box.  It was easy to setup and link to my prime account.  I liked being able to watch prime movies on my television rather than my computer screen.  That all changed. I went away for work for 3 days. When I got home and tried to use FireTV the unit would not turn on at all!I went online and tried the suggestions on the firetv support site.  I then spoke with a customer support agent and described my issue.  He said they would send a new power supply and if that didn't help they would then send a new unit.  Doing the quick shipping math, even with one-day shipping, if the unit is defective I won't be watching anything on my brick of a device for 5 days minimum.  I asked them to send me a new unit and I will send this one back and therefore no back-and-forth.  They told me the device light would still come on if it was the device, the light not coming on indicated a power supply issue.  I said, "ok, i understand that but send it overnight so I am not waiting multiple days."  He promised it would be sent for one-day delivery no later than Tuesday. This was on a Sunday after 5pm so I was okay with that.Monday morning i received an email from Amazon to expect my power supply Wednesday by 8pm!  Really.  Amazon doesn't care about keeping promises to it's PRIME customers!  This thing better work.***Update:  Surprise!  Didn't work.  Why couldn't Amazon just do as the customer requested in the first place.  Had this piece of junk for a few weeks now used it twice.  sending it back.

review: We purchased the Amazon Fire TV to give us a streaming option while traveling. Overall, we are satisfied with the performance but wish it worked the same for all of the available apps.
